entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
